item.title: This Field is Going to be Commercial Corn This Year!
item.description: What's the plan for this field? This video documents a major change in our operation as we switch to planting commercial corn this year, showing the preparation and planting process.

media:content.media:title: This Field is Going to be Commercial Corn This Year!
media:content.media:description: What's the plan for this field? This video documents a major change in our operation as we switch to planting commercial corn this year, showing the preparation and planting process.

item.title: Finally We Get to the Fun Part!
item.description: What happens after all the hard work? This video documents the moment we finally finish the boring prep and get to the fun part of the project or job.

item.title: Can I Do IT?
item.description: I’m putting my skills and endurance to the ultimate test. This video documents my intense attempt to conquer a major challenge and see if I have what it takes to finish.

item.title: A Beautiful Morning!
item.description: What creates the perfect start to a day? This video documents a beautiful morning on the farm, capturing the peace, fresh air, and essential work that makes the job so rewarding.

item.title: Guarding Our Sweet Corn From Sneaky Critters!
item.description: What happens when pesky critters want your corn? This video shows our attempt to build a fence that is durable and effective enough to keep them out of our garden and protect the harvest.

item.title: Fixing A Really Big Sprinkler!
item.description: Go inside a challenging repair job. We’ll show you the complex steps involved in diagnosing and fixing a really big sprinkler system to ensure the entire field gets the water it needs.

item.title: John Deere Equipment For The Win!
item.description: Join us for a look at our John Deere equipment. We'll show you the power, efficiency, and engineering that makes these machines a game-changer for modern farming.

item.title: Rising From Ashes: Rebuilding After The Fire
item.description: Go inside a powerful story of hope and renewal. We'll show you the emotional and physical challenge of rebuilding after the fire, detailing every step of our path to recovery.

item.title: Can You Believe This is On?
item.description: After sitting for years, we thought it was dead.

item.title: Lost In The Trees: Tracking The Elusive Bull
item.description: Lost in the dense trees! Join us on a high-stakes search for a valuable bull. This video shares the challenging tracking techniques and the long journey of finding a lost animal.

item.title: Scariest Part of our Year!
item.description: Scariest Part of our Year!

item.title: Young Farmers Planting Corn
item.description: What does the future of farming look like? This video documents young farmers working together, showing the tools, techniques, and enthusiasm required to get the corn crop in the ground.

item.title: He's Checking on my Seed Levels!
item.description: Why is seed level so important? This video shows the crucial process of checking the planter's inventory to ensure we have the right amount of seed for a smooth and efficient run.

item.title: Brrr, Battery Blues in Nebraska’s Frosty Embrace!
item.description: The freezing Nebraska weather is causing major battery trouble. This video documents the cold-weather challenges we faced and the urgent repairs needed to get our equipment running again.

item.title: Cold Starting Old Tractors
item.description: What does it take to start a vintage machine in freezing temperatures? This video documents the tricks, techniques, and sheer effort required for a cold start on an old tractor.

item.title: Harvest Season Is In Full Swing
item.description: The busiest season is here! This video documents the full swing action of the harvest, showing the machines working at full speed to get the crops in from the field.

item.title: So Hot in the Corn Field!
item.description: Why is working in the corn field so tough in the heat? This video documents the brutal reality of a hot harvest, showing the physical endurance required to get the job done right.

item.title: We Surprised Our Friends With a FREE TRACTOR!
item.description: What's the best way to surprise a friend? This video documents the heartwarming moment we gave away a free tractor, capturing the unforgettable reaction and the story behind this act of generosity.

item.title: Shutting off a Pivot While It's Raining! #reel #rain #pivot #farmlife #fblifestyle
item.description: A quick look at a necessary job. We’ll show you the steps for shutting off a pivot and avoiding over-irrigation when unexpected rain hits the field.

item.title: STUCK Tractor On The First Day Of Harvest
item.description: The worst way to start harvest! This video documents a major setback—getting our tractor stuck on the first day—and the urgent rescue mission required to get the machine back to work.
